data.name: Clawface - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack for Clawface, composed and produced by Sacred Admirer.
Special thanks to the Hathos Interactive development team for this opportunity to collaborate. Inspiration drawn from Brad Fiedel’s work on Terminator 2, Nick “nelward” Elward’s works and guidance, Howard Drossin’s work on Sonic Spinball, and years of ‘80s media consumption, despite having lived through none of it.

FLAC format
44100hz sample rate
Stereo

Total size: 106Mb
Soundtrack length: 14 minutes

Tracklist
1. Clawface Theme
2. Toxic Shark*
3. Dimension Highway
4. Wasp Patrol*
5. Guardian of Tomorrow

*These tracks were ultimately not included in the final version of the game but were used in finding the stylistic direction and aesthetic of the other tracks.
